1.content:
It was a normal day in the village of konoha, except for a boy no older than 3 was running as fast as he could from a mob of civilians and one or two chinins.

“Kill the demon”, shouted one of the civilians as they chased the boy farther. Other things were heard like:

“Hell spawn”

“Monster”

“Kyuubi brat”

The little kid was thinking ‘What did I ever do to them? Why are they doing this to me? I never hurt anyone.’

After a while he ran into the forest and hid behind a tree to catch his breath.

They looked around’ but couldn’t find him. “Where’d he go”, shouted a chunin. “Who cares, he’ll probably die out here anyway so lets go back to the village.” They all agreed and went back to the village.

The kid was silently crying behind a tree whimpering, “What did I do?”

This kid was known as Naruto Uzumaki, the one who had the kyuubi inside of him.
1.title: Sojokou Senkou

11.content:
When naruto had finally stopped crying he decided to go back to the village, the only problem was that he had no idea where he was. Naruto thought ‘Oh crap, I don’t know where I am.’ After walking around for hours trying to find his way back to the village he gave up and just lied down on the ground exhausted and thought, ‘So this is how I die huh. It doesn’t matter since no one will miss me besides the old man.’

When he crawled to a tree to sleep under he saw something in the distance and using his remaining strength he crawled to the clearing and saw a huge mansion. He went towards it and stared in awe. Naruto went to open the door, as soon as he touched the doorknob his hand got cut. Naruto jumped back and screamed. “OUCH WHAT KIND OF RETARD HAS A SPIKED DOORKNOB.”

The doorknob then glowed and the door opened and, after getting over his hiisy fit, he went inside. ‘THIS PLACE IS FUCKING HUGE’ he thought.

Indeed it was. The place was four stories high, had a living room full of fresh furniture, a kitchen the size of his whole apartment, and the bedrooms were able to fit at least 17 people. So all in all Naruto was shocked. With energy he didn’t even know he had he had he started running through the house looking at everything his blue eyes could see.

When he got back downstairs after looking at the whole house he noticed a picture and looked at it. It was a picture of a man with long spicky blonde hair in a standard jonin outfit except he was wearing a whit trenchcoat with red flames at the bottom and the kanji for ‘fourth’ in the middle. Next to him was a woman with long red hair that went down to her lower back wearing anormal black shirt and jonin style pants, she also looked 8 months pregnant.

Naruto stares at the picture for several minutes before he recognized it. ‘That must be The Fourth Hokage and his wife. They look so happy together. I wish I was happy like that.’

He kept on looking until he saw something poking out of the side of the picture. As curious as he is he pulled it out of the picture and now he was holding 2 pieces of paper in his hand. He looked at the two pieces of paper and started to read them. They said:

Dear Naruto,

If you are reading this then you are either 16 or a chunin. First of all I would like to say is that I am Minato Namikaze, the Fourth Hokage. I am also your father. If the old man hasn’t already told you then this letter will. On the date of your birth, on October 10th the terrible beast kyuubi no kitsune attacked. We are running out of time so I am going to use the ‘Reaper Death Seal’ to deal it into something, but I can only seal into a new born baby. That baby was you Naruto. I am so sorry, that technique was a last result and nothing alse worked. I have good news though. We have a bloodline. That bloodline allows us to have advanced chakra control, and gives us power of the sub-elements. Every Namikaze has that ability to control a sub-element. The sub-elements possible are ice, wood, magma, sand, and storm. All the other information are in scrolls locked inside the Namikaze vault(just wipe some blood on the vault and it will open). Once again son I am sorry for cursing you I just hope that we can meet again in the afterlife so I can apologize. I love you son.

Your father,

Minato Namikaze

Fourth Hokage

p.s. to find out wkat happened to your mother read the other letter.

p.s.s if you see an old looking guy with long white hair give him a hard kick in the ass for me.

Naruto was beyond shocked, his father the fourth hokage had sealed the kyuubi in him and condemned him to a life of loneliness. Then the shock turned to anger as he thought just one word, ‘kyuubi’.

He was too tired to be angry so he just went over to a couch and went to sleep only to wake up in a sewer like place. He heard some low growling and decided to follow the sound only to end up in front of a huge cage with the kanji for ‘seal’ in the middle. He went towards the cage and stopped 10 feet in front of it. Then a huge pair of claws come shooting out of the cage and stopped right in front of his face. He flinched a little bit, but still stayed standing.

The claws went back in and a thundering voice said, “So my container comes to visit.” Naruto just stared emotionlessly at thr giant fox. The fox was impressed, ‘Even a kage level shinobi would be scarred of me but this kid just stares at me.’ The kyuubi looked in his eyes and almost gasped. ‘Those eyes! If I wasn’t the lord of hell I would be scared. Those are the most cold, and emotionless eyes I have ever seen. Not even seasoned shinobi have eyes that lifeless.’

Naruto eyes suddenly filled with anger and hate, “THIS IS ALL YOUR FAULT. IF YOU HADN’T ATTACKED I COULD’VE HAD A FAMILY. WHY? Why did you attack” he screamed, but quieted down at the end and started to cry.

The kyuubi just said in an equally quiet voice, “Kit it wasn’t my choice to attack.” Naruto looked into the eyes of the kyuubi and saw true sadness. The kyuubi continued, “I was just going for some food since my mate just gave birth to my kit and she was weak.” The kyuubi eyes started to water at this point(A/N: Hey, even if you’re an all power full demon you still have feeling especially for your mate. Back to the story.) “I came home to find my mate and newborn kit slaughtered” Naruto gasped at this “I wanted to find the one responsible for this so I searched the den and I found a leaf headband. I went into rage and charged towards the leaf, shortly after I was sealed into you by your father.”

Naruto was completely shell shocked and did something he rarely did, he bowed and apologized. “I am very sorry for yelling at you kyuubi.” The kyuubi just waved him of with a paw saying, “it’s all right kit. All is forgiven.”

Naruto got up and grinned sheepishly and then turned serious, “Kyuubi I need to leave the village to be able to defend myself and to get stronger or I’m going to die and if my hunch is correct if I die you die. The kyuubi was shocked and replied,

“You are correct kit. I am actually surprised that a boy of 3 years is so smart.” Naruto smirked and said, “Well when you have angry mobs chasing you all your life you have to grow up fast and learn quickly.”

“wise words from a wise young man.” Kyuubi replied. “Looks like it’s time to wake up kit. When you wake up read your mother’s letter, then let me take control to get you back to your old apartment and write a note and then we’ll come back, gather all the scrolls and leave the village.” Naruto nodded.

He then woke up and after rubbing the sleep out of his eyes he found his mother’s letter and started to read it. It read:

Dear Naruto,

If you are reading this then you have already read your father’s note. I am sorry for leaving you my son but there were complications during your birth and I’m not going to make it. Nom don’t go thinking its your fault cause it’s not. Nom as it said in your father’s note I also have a bloodline. It’s a doujutsu called Rinnegan. This bloodline has special abilities that give you affinities to all five elements and the rest of the Rinnegan’s are in the scrolls in the vault. Right now you are the last holder of the Rinnegan because it’s birthplace was the Uzumaki Country and it no longer exists because it was wiped out bu a batallion of Earth and Lightning country. I was on a mission when it happened so I fled to Konoha and met your faher. Remember son I will always love you. So this is goodbye my little boy.

Your mother

Kushina Uzumaki

p.s. like your father if you see an old man with white hairs kick him in the balls for me

Naruto laughed a bit as he dried his tears. He then said in his mind, ‘Okay kyuubi, you can take over now.’ (A/N: Sorry I didn’t mention earlier, but kyuubi established a mental connection between them and told Naruto. Back to the story.)

Kyuubi nodded as Naruto’s eyes turned red and he raced back to his house.

As soon as he dot there he pulled out a piece of paper and wrote a note to the sandaime. It said:

Dear old man,

If you are reading this then I am no longer in the village. The reason I have left is because I need to get stronger to defend myself against the ninja and civilians that attack me. The kyuubi is helping me and yes I know about him and when I get back I will tell you why he attacked. See you in 10 years old man.

Sincerely,

Naruto Uzumaki Namikaze

p.s. I also hnow about my heritage.

He put the note on the table and went back to the Namikaze compound. When he go there he got all the scrolls, put them into a larger scroll and headed for the gate.(A/N: kyuubi also taught him basic sealing. Back to the story.) when sandaime found the note he let out a few tears, ‘I’m sorry Naruto’ meanwhile naruto had just snuck throught the gates never to be seen for the next 10 years
11.title: chapter 2

111.content:
It’s been 10 long years since Naruto left the village. The villagers partied but they were all stopped and arrested by the anbu and sent to Ibiki. The sandaime was eagerly waiting for his return. ‘It’s been 10 long years since that day Naruto. I hope that you come back soon…. My grandson.’

At the main entrance of the village a figure about 5’10 in. tall was walking towards the gate. He was wearing a blue trenchcoat with red flames at the bottom. It also had the kanji for ‘fire, water, Earth, wind, and lightning’ in an X pattern and in the middle was the kanji for ‘Sojokou Senkou’(Elemental Flash). He was also wearing a black muscle shirt that showed off his 8 pack abs. He was also wearing blue shinobi pants with a sword strapped to his side, and was also wearing black shinobi sandals. His hair was just as wild, spicky and yellow as his father’s.

This person was none other than Naruto Uzumaki Namikaze.

He was nearing the gates and asked his tenant, ‘hey kyuu do you think I should put up a transformation to hide myself until I get to the tower.’ “Yeah kit, you probably should since they probably still hate you.” Naruto sighed, ‘okay I’ll put the transformation up.

He transformed and looked like a 35 year old man. He approached the gate and the guard on the left said, “Halt! Name and biusness.

“Shingo Mattsumoto and I’m here to visit an old friend.” Said the disguised Naruto.

“All right go ahead, but please don’t cause any trouble or you will be tossed out” said the guard on the right.

‘Shingo’ nodded and walked all the way to the Hokagr Tower.

In the office of the Hokage Sasuke Sarutobi was battling the grearest of all enemies known to kages, paperwork. Sarutobi sighed and said outloud, “Naruto, please come back and take this job away so I can go back to retirement “

“I may just take you up on that offer old man” said a voice. Sarutobi looked up only to meet a 35 year old brown haired man. Sarutobi said,

“Excuse me, but who are you? And only one person may call me old man and ha has been gone for 10 years.”

“Whoops let me take care of that and them he put his hands in the ram seal and said, “Release.”

Sarutobi just about had a heart attack when he looked into the face of someone he thought was dead and could only utter one word, “Minato”. Naruto laughed and said,

“Sorry old man but I’m not my old man. Instead I’m Naruto Uzumaki Namikaze.”

Sarutobo went into a deeper shock and did the only thing that a kage would never do. He fainted. Naruto just sighed and waited for him to wake up.

Three hours later.

Sarutobi woke up and thought all that was a dream but then he saw Naruto in a corner calmly reading a book. Sarutobi just sighed and sat back up in his chair and asked Naruto how his training trip was. Naruto just responded that he could beat his father without even tying because his power merged with the kyuubi. Sarutobi was shocked that Naruto was so strong and said, “yout just like your father. Mastering so many jutsu and becoming so strong at such a young age.”

Naruto just grinned and said,” I’m just that good.”

Sarutobi also grinned and said, “Well Naruto I suppose you are going to the ninja academy.”

Naruto sighed and said, “to be honest, I really don’ want to be with a bunch of brats who don’t know shit about being a ninja.” He sighed again, “But if its to become the best then I’ll do what I have to do.”

“Then I’ll write a note to the teachers of the graduating class that they will have a new student for the graduating exams.” Said Sarutobi. He then pulled out a black headband that went down his back like a ponytail. Naruto put iy on and said goosbye before he disappeared in a flash of lightning. Sarutobi saw the kanji on the back of his trenchcoat and muttered two words, “No way.”

Iruka Umino was 25 years old, had brown hair that was tied ina ponytail similar to shikamaru, had a normal normal chunin outfit on and had a large scar across his nose. He just got a letter from the hokage that they would have a new graduating student. He didn’t think someone could get in just after the exam, but if he was recommended personally by the hokage then he must be good.

The assistant teacher Mizuki also looked like a normal chunin except that he had grey hair that was covered by a bandana style headband. If you looked closely you good see a evil glint behind his eyes. He, like Iruka, was also surprised that the hokage allowed someone in so late after they just had the genin exam.

Iruka decided it was time to start to start the class so he said, “Settle down class.”

Nothing happened, “please settle down.”

No reaction

Iruka developed a tick mark above his head and using his devil head jutsu he yelled

“SHUT THE FUCK UP.”

The class immediately quieted down because even the ever stoic Uchiha and Aburame were frightened of that jutsu. Iruka’s head went back to its normal size and he said, “Well class today is the day that you graduate and become shinobi. Before we get on to the team assignments we have a new student joining us.

Everyone was shocked that there was a new student after they just went through 6 years of the academy and some new guy can just waltz in here and automatically graduate without taking a single class.

Then everyone’s favorite banshee bit- I mean Sakura voiced everyone’s thought, “Iruka sensei, how come we had to go through 6 years of the academy and then some new guy can just waltz right in here without taking a single class.” Several others nodded in agreement.

Iruka sighed, “ He was given permission from the hokage to be here because the hokage says he’s, and I quote, ‘A prodigy not scene since Itachi Uchiha.”

At Itachi’s name Sasuke listened intently. It was no big secret that Sasuke absolutely loathed his brother for what he did. He killed the entire Uchiha clan leaving only him and his twin sister Saya left alive. Just then the door opens and everyone holds there breath in anticipation to see who it is. Naruto walked in with an aura of coolness that Sasuke could only dream about. He was wearing what he wore to meet the hokage except the trenchcoat. He surveyed the class and he noticed that all but one girl(coughsakuracough) were eyeing him with looks of lust and hunger. He ignored most of the class except for a select few that caught his eye.

The first was a girl that had shiny gray hair that went down to her shoulder blades, had coal black eyes, and she wore a mask across the lower half of her face. She wore a black tanktop that hugged her curves perfectly, and had small ample c-cup breasts. She also had on blue shinobi pants and blue shinobi sandals. ‘She must be from the Hatake clan. So that is Kakashi and Anko’s child. Her name is Kira Hatake.’ He gave her a wink and she blushed. Other girls gave her a death glare.

The second one who caught his eye was The Ice Queen Of The Academy Saya Uchiha herself. She wore the standard Uchiha clothes that consisted of a navy blue tank top with the Uchiha symbol on her back and, instead of white shorts like her brother; she had on black biker shorts that hugged her hips perfectly. She also had midnight blue hair that went down to her mid-back, small c-cup breasts and luscious legs. ‘One of the two Uchiha clan survivors. If what kyuubi told me about C.R.A(Clan Restoration Act) is true then I might be able to have some fun in the near future with all these lovely ladies, but for now I think I’ll get to know them.’ He flashed her a foxy grin that had all the girls, especially Saya, blush and have a mini orgasm.

The final one that caught his eye was Yukina Nara, a girl from the Nara clan. She was different then your average Nara because she wasn’t as lazy as every other Nara and she actually trained and didn’t think ‘everything’ was troublesome. She wore a fishnet shirt with a small tan jacket, like her cousin Shikamaru, along with black pants that weren’t too loose nor too tight. She had mid. C-cup breasts with ling brown hair that went a little lower than her shoulders. ‘A Nara that doesn’t think everything is troublesome. That’s new. If my spies serve me correctly then these 3 are known the ice queens of the academy and they got it right perfectly. When we get older I think we’ll have a lot of fun together.’ Thought Naruto. as her a look of love and she blushed heavily and he quickly gave this look to all 3 girls and they all blushed and looked away. He thought that was enough fun…..for now. He decided to introduce himself.

“Hello, my name in Naruto Uzumaki Namikaze, it’s nice to meet you all.”
111.title: Chapter 3

1111.content:
When Iruka heard his name he was beyond shocked, ‘this is Naruto. I heard he disappeared 10 years ago. He’s back.’ He thought happily.

Mizuki, however, had different thoughts, ‘the demon boy is back that could ruin my plans’ he thought angrily. He then added as an afterthought ‘maybe I can use this to my advantage.’

The student’s thoughts were this:

‘He looks HOT.’ Thought all the girls.

‘He looks weak’ from Kiba and the emo prince.

‘He’ll never be as strong as strong as my Sasuke-kun’ thought the pink whore.

‘Is this the boy that my father told me stories about. He also is very cute.’ Thought Kira with a small blush.

‘He looks strong. I think I’ll ask this handsome young man to spar with me later’ thought Saya with the same blush as Kira.

‘this boy looks good and I can tell he is strong by the aura he producing. He is also a major hottie.’ Thought Yukina with a blush.

‘munch, munch, munch’ from Choji

‘troublesome’ from Shikamaru

‘……..’ from Shino

After Iruka got over his shock he asked Naruto to sit next to Kira. He nodded and say next to Kira who still had a blush on her face. He then started to explain the exams.

“Today is the genin exam. It will consist of the parts. The written exam, weapons accuracy, and ninjutsu.” They nodded and they began. When they were finished the scores are the following:

Naruto: 100

Yukina:98

Sasuke:96

Sakura:95

Saya:93

Kira:93

Hinata:91

Ino:89

Shino:88

Choji:86

Shikamaru:75

Kiba:50

“All right class the written part is done and the top three scores are Sasuke with a 96. Yukina with a 98 and Naruto with perfect 100.” Iruka announced

Sasuke was a little pist off, ‘how is that nobody smarter than me, an elite Uchiha.’

‘that just proves my point that he is strong because you have to be really smart to get a better score than a Nara.’ Came from Yukina.

Naruto looked bored.

“lets go outside for the weapon and ninjutsu part” said Iruka. When they went outside they started. The scores were:

Naruto:10/10

Sasuke:9/10

Saya:8/10

Yukina, Kira:7/10

Sakura, Ino, Shino, Choji, Hinata:6/10

Shikamaru:5/10

Kiba:4/10

That ends the weapons portion and the top 3 scores are Saya with 8/10, then Sasuke with 9/10 and finally Naruto with 10/10.” Iruka announced.

Sasuke was now royally ticked, ‘the loser beat mw again. I’ll show him an the ninjutsu exam and reclaim my title as #1, since it only belongs to uchiha and not blonde haired idiots.’

Saya thoughts were of awe, ‘wow, not since the fourth hokage has anyone got a perfect score.’

Naruto still looked bored.

Iruka then announced that it was time for the ninjutsu part of the exam. “to pass this all you have to do is the transformation, substitution, and clone techniques and for extra credit you can do a jutsu you learned outside of the academy.” He said.

They all did the required techniques and some did the extra credit. Kiba did his ‘fang over fang’, Choji did his ‘partial expansion jutsu.’, Shino did his ‘bug clone’, Hinata did her families ‘8 trigrames air palms’ (A/N Hinata is also wearing a mask just like Naruto except that hers is of shyness. She is going to take the mask of once she becomes a genin. Back to the story.) Shikamaru did his ‘shadow possession jutsu’, Ino did her ‘mind transfer jutsu, and Sasuke did his ‘fireball jutsu’.

He gave an arrogant smirk at Naruto that just screamed ‘beat that’ Naruto still looked bored as he performed the required jutsu with no hand seals, whish shocked the class and caused a certain Uchiha to seethe, and for the extra credit jutsu he asked for people to stand back and he went through 5 hand seals ending on tiger and shouted out:

FIRE STYLE: INFERNO FIRE BLAST(A/N: why no one thought of that I’ll never know.)

The reaction they got was a giant black fireball shot out of his mouth and shot towards a couple of trees and they all exploded. When the smoke cleared they saw a 15 fett deep crater that was about 1 mile in diameter.

Everyone was either staring at awe, fear, or jealsy. When he found his voice Iruka asked, “ W-What w-was that Naruto.”

Naruto answered, “that was I jutsu I invented called fire style inferno fire blast. I got that name because it has the fires of a furnace and is more of a blast then a ball it works like this, you gather chakra to your chest, then you have to compress it to its greatest form and then just blow it out of you. That technique is an s-rank jutsu because it consumes the ckakra quality of a mid-jonin.”

Everyone was shocked that he invented an s-rank technique and he was only their age. Sasuke was shaking in barely suppressed rage, ‘ how did he get so powerful. He better not get too comfortable because as soon as I get my sharingan I will take your jutsu.’

“Okay class, the genin exams are now over. It’s now time for lunch so come back in half an hour for team assignments.” They all nodded and left for lunch while Iruka went to make up the teams.
1111.title: chapter 4

11111.content:
Naruto sat on top of the roof of the academy eating some fruit and a sandwich. He sensed 3 people behind him. He turned around to see Saya, Kira and Yukina. He decided to ask what they were doing up here. “what are you ladies doing up here? Can I help you with something?” he asked.

Kira answered, “Actually we were all coming up to see you when w ran into each other….

Flashback jutsu
Kira was running towards the stairs when she ran into Saya and Yukina. “where are you two going? She asked.

Yukina answered, “we were going to see if Naruto-kun is up there. What about you?”

‘Naruto-kun’ thought Kira with a raised eyebrow. “I was also going up there to talk to him. I wanted to know if he was the boy my father told stories about.”

Saya asked, “What did your father tell him about.”

Kira decided to tell them “okay, it all started when I was 4...

Flashback within flashback

“Kira it’s time for bed” said a younger looking Kakashi.

“only if you tell me a story” said a 4-year-old Kira.

Kakashi sighed, “okay but only if you go to bed right after, promise.”

“I promise” said Kira in cute voice.

“okay here’s a story about a boy I once knew. This boy was very strong and mature for his age. He fought for everything even though no one acknowledged him or even cared that he existed. The reason he was treated like this was of a burden that he carried. What he carried caused a lot of pain and torment. It was beyond his control, but no one cared and they usually just ignored him or glare at him. Some of them went as far to beat him. But he never gave in and he always fought back and tried again. You see Kira the moral of this story is that even if you are down you are not ever out. Remember this boy and if you ever see him you should be his friend because he really needs friends.” Stated Kakashi

“what was his name” said Kira sleepily.

“his name is Naruto Uzumaki.” With that Kira fell asleep.

End flashback within flashback

Yukina and Saya were shocked and almost in tears. “that was the story he told you.” Asked Saya.

Kira nodded and Saya and Yukina looked like they were gonna break down. There was silence for a few seconds before Kira asked, “are we gonna go see him now.”

Yukina and Saya wiped their eyes and nodded as they followed Kira up the stairs.

Flashback jutsu release

Naruto was shocked that Kakashi said that about him. “thanks for telling me that Kira-chan” said Naruto Kira blushed, while the other 2 girls through her envious looks. “so what would you like to talk about” he asked.

They spent the next 15 minutes talking to each other and they joked to each other. Naruto near died laughing when Saya told him how she pranked Sasuke an turned his hair pink for a whole month, and when Kira helped her mother (A/N: if you forgot her mother you should go back to chapter 3. back to the story.) hide all her father’s icha icha paradise and replace it with the yaoi version. He hadn’t laughed this hard in his whole entire life.

When it was 5 minutes until they had to go back into the classroom and Kira and Yukina went back t get a good seat. Naruto and Saya were just leaving when Saya tripped over a hole in the ground and she fell with a yelp. Naruto looked back and saw Saya on the ground clutching her ankle. “Saya, are you okay?” asked Naruto

Saya shook her head as tears came out of her beautiful onyx eyes. “ I t-t-tripped and m-my ank-kle h-h-hurts.” She said with her voice shaking the whole time. Naruto walked over to her and helped her to the ledge where she sat down with her eyes still watering.

Naruto asked which ankle it was and she responded saying that it was her left ankle. Naruto nodded and carefully removed her shoe and added chakra to his hands and started to massage her foot and ankle. Saya gasped as she felt pleasure she never felt before and saw that it was Naruto who was rubbing her bare foot.

She only had one thought in her head and it was, ‘oh my kami, that feels good. I should hurt myself more often if this is the special treatment I get. I definitely want him more noooooooooowwwwwww.’ She gave off a very soft moan. She was in heaven now.

Naruto heard the moan and it turned him on a little bit. He decided to have a little fun and increased the chakra in his hands, which got the reaction he wanted. Saya moaned even louder and she got a little wet. Naruto then decided that it was almost time for class to start again so he used some minor medical jutsu and her ankle healed instantly.

She was disappointed that the pleasure she was feeling was gone. Naruto gave her ankle a kiss and slipped her shoe back on. Saya moaned from the kiss. She always had very sensitive feet and loved having a massage done on them but she sometimes hated being tickled because even if you slightly brush them with your finger she will laugh out loud.

After her shoe was bacon Naruto said, “lets go back to class okay Saya.” She nodded, still having a rosy red blush on her face. Naruto noticed the blush and decided to tease her a bit, “if you liked the massage so much then you can come to my place to receive a spa treatment for free if you like Saya-chan.” He said as seductively as he could. Saya blushed so hard that she did something so unlike her.

She fainted.

Naruto caught her as she fell. He laughed. He looked at her peaceful face. He decided, ‘ahhh why not?’ he thought as he gave her a very soft kiss on her lips. Saya gave a soft moan as she silently woke up without him noticing. She mumbled, “I love you Naruto-kun.”

Naruto opened hi eyes wide and took a good look at her and could tell she was awake and bent down to her ear and said in a whisper. “I love you to Saya-chan.” Then he kissed her.

Saya’s eyes snapped open and she kissed him back. Naruto licked her lips, asking for entrance which she happily did. Their tongues wrestled for dominance, which Naruto won. He tilted her head back to deepen the kiss and she moaned happily. After 3 minutes they stopped to catch their breath. “does this mean we’re bf and gf” said Saya.

Naruto just kissed her and said, “does this answer your question.” Saya just nodded.

“lets go back to the classroom Saya-tenshi” Naruto said. Saya blushed scarlet and nodded.

When they got back to the classroom, everyone else was already back in the classroom. Naruto and Saya sat next to Kira and Yukina who asked where they were. Before they could answer Iruka came back into the classroom. ( skip speech and first six teams because it’s boring and they aren’t important enough)

“team 7 is Sasuke Uchiha, Sakura Haruno, and Sai.

Team 8 is Hinata Hyuuga, Kiba Inuzuka, and Shino Aburame.

Team 9 is Kira Hatake, Saya Uchiha, Yukina Nara and Naruto Namikaze.

Team 10 is Ino Yamanaka, Shikamaru Nara, and Choji Akimichi.”

“The jonin sensei will be here shortly. I have other business to take care of so goodbye.

After a while the sensei came and went. A beautiful read eyed woman came in for team 8. A bearded man with a cigarette in his mouth dressed in a standard jonin outfit came for team 10. only team 7 and team 9 were left. Sasuke decided that he wanted answers from the blonde so he went over to Naruto, with Sakura following like the little whore she is.

“hey idiot, where did you learn how to do jutsu like that? As an Uchiha I have a right to any fire jutsu you invented and any other jutsu you know. So you better tell me or you will regret it.” Said Sasuke arrogantly. Sakura nodded like a lost puppy.

Naruto stared at the Uchiha with cold blue eyes that it even made the 3 behind him shiver uncontrollably. “No you stuck up, worthless Uchiha.” Said Naruto with a perfect monotones voice.

Sasuke was enraged and yelled, “A clanless nobody like you doesn’t deserve power like that. Power like that belongs only to elite Uchiha not idiots like you’

Naruto lost it and he punched Sasuke so hard that he flew right into the wall with his nose broken. Everyone was shocked, but that shock turned to fear as he pulled out his katana and it ignited into lightning chakra and he was just about to gut him like a fish when he felt 3 pairs of arms wrap around him. One belonged to Saya and the other 2 belonged to Kira and Yukina.

“please stop Naru-kun.” Begged Saya with tears in her eyes. “he may be an asshole but he’s still my brother. Please don’t kill him.” The other 2 just nodded.

Naruto calmed down and his lightning chakra disappeared and he looked at Sasuke with anger in his eyes and said in his monotone, “next time they won’t be here to save you. If you ever bothered to look at my family history you would now that I am from the Namikaze clan, the founding clan of Konoha.” He started to walk back to his seat when he looked back at Sasuke and said, “and when your sharingan activates, don’t bother trying to copy my jutsu because my Rinnegan, plus the seal I invented prevents the sharingan from copying my jutsu.” He then sat back down.

Sasuke was seething because he couldn’t get any of his jutsu. ‘just you wait Naruto Namikaze. I will find a way to get your jutsu and then I’ll kill you and then your next Itachi.’

Then after another 10 minutes a jonin with a fishnet shirt, mini skirt, with a trench coat on walked into the room.

“Hi mom” said Kira.

“Hi Kira-chan” said the woman.

“excuse me but who are you?” said Saya.

“Oh me. I am team 9’s sensei Anko Hatake” said Anko.

“meet me on the roof.” Said Anko disappearing via shunshin.

“Let’s go ladies” said Naruto as he grabbed them all around the waist, causing them all to blush, and disappearing in a flash of lightning.

Sasuke seethed, Sakura watched awed, and Sai watched silently,

They appeared on the roof to see Anko eating dango. Anko looked at them and said let’s introduce ourselves. I’ll go first, my name is Anko Hatake. My likes are Kaka-kun, Kira-chan, dango, and red bean soup. My dislikes are the snake sannin Oro-teme. My hobbies are” she blushes a bit “your to young to know. My dream is to kill Orochimaru and to see Kira-chan grow up and be happily married.”

Kira blushed and said, “ mooooomm, not in front of everyone.”

Anko laughed and said, “why don’t you go next Kira-chan.”

Kira reluctantly nodded and said, “my name is Kira Hatake. My likes are my parents and” she blushes a bit and looks at Naruto “miso soup with eggplant. My dislikes are anyone who hurt people for no reason and my mom when she embarrasses me. My hobbies are training and hanging with my friends my dream is to lead the Hatake clan” ‘and to marry Naru-kun.’

Anko noticed that her daughter was looking at Naruto when she said her likes and smiled inwardly, ‘so she likes Naruto eh. Not that I don’t approve, but if he hurts her in any way I’ll feed him to my snakes.’

“next you in the blue,” said Anko.

“my name is Saya Uchiha, my likes are training and Naru-kun. My dislikes are my stupid little brother and my stupid older brother, and fangirls. My hobbies are training and spending time with Naru-kun. My dream is to marry Naru-kun and be a strong ninja.” Saya said.

‘so she also likes Naruto. He is going to have lots of girl problems later.’ Thought Anko.

“next you with in the brown” said Anko.

“my name is Yukina Nara. My likes are making shadow techniques and Naruto-kun. My dislikes are the Nara clan’s laziness. My hobbies are making techniques for my clan and my dream is to try to make the Nara clan less lazy.”

“that is a great dream” Anko said. ‘so she has a dream to change an entire clan. That is a tough dream and with Naruto by her side I have no doubt she can do it.’

“lastly the blonde one,” Anko said

“my name is Naruto Uzumaki Namikaze. My likes are Saya-hime, Kira-hime, Yukina-hime” causing all to blush and Anko to smile “and inventing new jutsu. My dislikes are arrogant assholes, stupid fangirls, and people who blame them for something they had no control over. My hobbies are training and spending time with these 3 lovely ladies” again causing them to blush scarlet and Anko to smile mischievously “and my dream is to become the strongest and to change this village for the better,”

‘so spending 10 years on his own really taught him something. I hope you achieve your dream Naruto.’ Anko thought.

All right tomorrow we are going to be having a test to see if you are all worthy of having the rank of genin because of the 30 of you that graduate only 12, sometimes 13, will become genin. There is a failure rate of 66. Anyway come to training ground 44 tomorrow at 9 o’ clock. I’ll meet you there.” Explained Anko as she disappeared with shushin.

Then an anbu came out of the corner and said, “ Naruto-san, the council, and the hokage request your presence at a meeting.” He then disappeared.

Naruto turned to the 3 girls, “it appears they want to talk to me about something. I’ll talk to you guys when I’m done.” He walked over and gave a small kiss on the cheek to all 3 of them and left in a flash of fire,

They looked at each other, “I’m not losing to any of you” they said in unison.
11111.title: Chapter 5

111111.content:
Naruto was in Sarutobi’s office talking. “So what does the council want with me old man, besides trying to kill or banish me.” Naruto said.

“They want to talk about your bloodlines and your status in the bingo book.” Sarutobi responded handing Naruto a bingo book. He opened it to the very back and it said:

Name: Naruto Namikaze

Aliases: Sojoukou Senkou

Rank: ssss-rank ninja.

Status: flee-on-sight

Abilities: has strong elemental attacks. Moves faster than the speed of light. Supposed to have a rare doujutsu but no one has gotten close enough to tell and live.

Is responsible for wiping out 1000 earth shinobi with only 1 attack. Was also able to kill the fifth tschikage. Also responsible for killing 800 lightning shinobe along with the third raikage in two moves. This is a very dangerous enemy.

Naruto finished reading and responded, “I’m just that awesome aren’t I old man.”

Sarutobi laughed and said, “that you are Naruto. Now we have to get this meeting over with.”

When they got to the council chambers the noticed that everyone was already in there. The council is composed of the Hyuuga, Nara, Yamanaka, Akimichi, Aburame, and Inuzuka clan heads. That is the ninja half. The other is the civilian half, which is composed of mostly merchants and the head of the civilians Yasha Haruno, mother of, Sakura Haruno. She was the main voter for having Naruto executed when he was a baby.

Up top is where the hokage and elders sit the elders are Homura Mitokado, Koharu Utatane, and Danzo. They were all against Naruto for the same reasons as everyone else. When Naruto and Sarutobi got in the room the council, upon seeing Naruto, gasped in shock.

He was wearing his cloak and all the clothes he had on earlier and he was a perfect carbon copy of the fourth hokage. Except the for the whisker marks Naruto looked just like his father.

When Sarutobi sat down and cleared his voice the council was awake again. “So would you mind telling me what the hell I’m doing here.” Naruto said.

“you will treat us with respect you little brat” said a fat civilian.

Naruto just looked at him and said “I’ll speak to you pig fuckers anyway l want, and respect is earned not given you artard.”

The shinobi half snickered to themselves while the civilians and elders spluttered in shock.

“what did you want to talk to about.” Said Sarutobi.

“we wanted to see if what we read in the bingo book is true or not.” Homura said.

“the answer is yes. Everything you read is true.” Sarutobi said.

Danzo stood up in anger, “then that brat must be executed. He is too powerful to be left alive. Root kill the kyuubi brat.”

Root anbu came out if nowhere and started to attack Naruto. Naruto dodged all of their attacks and drew his sword and fused it with fire ckakra. He cut them all up and as soon as it hit them they all turned to ash.

Danzo was truly frightened and tried to make a run for it but Naruto was faster and he stabbed him in the back with the sword and he turned to ash.

Everyone, even the hokage, was scared of his power. Naruto slowly turned and looked at them with his cold blue eyes, that were once filled with life, that were now devoid of life.

“anyone else want to try anything.” Naruto said.

They all shook their heads in fear. Sarutobi looks at the remains of Danzo and sighed, “was it really necessary to kill him Naruto.”

Naruto nodded, “yes it was because I have spies that have reports that he was working with Earth and Lightning in attempts to destroy Konoha so that he could rebuild it and rule it himself.”

Sarutobi was surprised, “I see” was all he said

“That’s not all the ringleader behind this is none other than that snake in the grass Orochimaru.” Naruto responded hatefully.

Sarutobi was sad that his crazed ex-student still wanted revenge on the leaf. Then Naruto said, “they don’t have nearly enough numbers to attack us yet.” The council agreed and they now got back on topic.

The Nara head stood up and said, “the real reason we called you hear is to disuss your abilities and see whether or not they are bloodlines. Kami this is such a drag.” He sat back down.

Naruto nodded. “okay to answer your questions yes my abilities are a bloodline. Listen because I’m only going to say this once.” They all nodded.

“my first bloodline allows me to have the ability to use sub-elements. The sub-elements possible are ice, wood, magma, sand, and storm. To get the ice ability you must possess the elements water and wind, for wood its earth and water, sand is wind and earth, magma is fire and earth, and storm is water, wind and lightning. Storm is the hardest to have because it takes 3 elemental affinities. My father and me were the first people to have storm since the founder of the clan.”

Everyone tried to absorb this information. “who was tour father.?” Asked the Hyuuga head, fearing the answer. Naruto smiled mischievously.

“I’ll give you a hint. In battle he moved in a flash. He was in love with the color red, and his favorite number is four.” Naruto said happily.

Everyone was trying to figure out his riddle until the Nara head eyes shot open so much that they threatened to pop out if his sockets. “N-No way” he stuttered.

Everyone looked at him, because it most have been someone important to make the Nara loose their usual bored expression. Naruto had a grin on that threatened to split his face.

“I see that you figured it out. You are right, my father is the one and only Minato Namikaze. The Fourth Hokage.”

The shinobi side’s eyes threatened to pop out of their skulls just like Shikaku’s did. The civilian half were glaring at him thinking that the demon is trying to trick them. The elders also glared at him. The hokage kept a straight face since he already knew about his heritage. The Haruno clan head stood up ad screeched, “There is no way that demon is related to Minato. It’s just a trick. The demon is trying to trick you.”

Just then a kunai imbedded itself in the wall and the Haruno had a cut on her cheek. Then there was a flash of blue and Naruto was right behind her. ‘When did he…?’ thought Yasha when she and everybody else looked where he was a second ago they saw a small puddle of water that just disappeared.

‘Idiot’s’ thought the hokage ‘he’s called the Sojokou Senkou for a reason.’

Everyone else was simply amazed as none of them saw him move. Even the hokage barely saw him move.

“Listen to me. I am not the little boy you used as your punching bag. If anyone of you threatens me you will experience a long and painful death.” Naruto said in perfect monotone.

Homura, who was either very brave or very stupid (I think It’s the later more than the former. Back to the story.) stood up and said, “Is that a threat you little brat.”

“No, it’s a promise.” Naruto responded.

Naruto then flashed back to where he was and said to Sarutobi. “I really don’t fell like telling them about my second bloodline so here’s a scroll that explains the basics of the bloodline. There is also a little surprise for you at the bottom of the scroll okay old man.” He finished throwing him the scroll.

Sarutobi caught it and said, “ok Naruto I’ll tell them.” Naruto nods and leaves.

Sarutobi glares at the civilian half and says, “I shouldn’t even be telling you assholes anything, but since Naruto asked me to, I will.”

He unrolls scroll and reads out loud:

The bloodline is called the Rinnegen. The Rinnegan is the most powerful of the 3 legendary eye techniques. The reason it is the most powerful is because it gives the user affinities to all 5 elements, whish combined with my father’s bloodline that would make me an elemental master, and the other ability is that it allows us to spread our subconscious into other dead bodies and allows them to come back to life for a short period of time. They will also get the Rinnegan when they come back. The Rinnegan will disappear when they go back to the dead. Have a good day you cock sucking piece of shit pussy, motherfuckers of the civilian and elders of the council. By the way old man for the surprise I told you about just open up the seal at the bottom in your office, (he didn’t read this part out loud.)

The council looked shocked at his choice of words while the shinobi and hokage laughed out load. When everybody got back in their heads the Inuzuka clan head announced, “you know that he now falls under the C.R.A (Clan Restoration Act) right?”

“That I do Tsume, that I do.” Sarutobi said quietly.

Naruto actually left a clone there to hear the rest of the meeting. When he learned of the C.R.A. he was jumping for joy. He was mostly happy that he could date Saya, Kira and, Yukina without leaving any of them heartbroken. He just hoped that they would agree to share.

Contrary to what some people believe he was far from dense. He knew that those 3 liked him for him. He couldn’t wait to see them. He kept walking around for a bit before he saw Yukina sitting on a bench enjoying the clouds. ( A/N she may not be as lazy as other Nara’s but she does enjoy watching the clouds back to the story.)

Naruto gave smirk as he snuck up behind her and pit his arms around her waist. Her breath caught in her throat. She slowly turned and saw Naruto holding her. She blushed cherry red.

“What are you doing here Naruto-kun?” asked Yukina as she relaxed in Naruto’s arms.

“I just came to talk to you, Saya, and Kira about my meeting with the council fuckers.” Naruto responded. Yukina blushed at his choice of words and reprimanded him for using dirty words.

After a while of looking for them they found Saya at an apartment complex. Naruto wondered why she was here but decided to ask her later. After telling her what they were going to do they went hunting for Kira. They found her at a dango shop. They all went to training ground 44.

So what did you guys talk about Naru-kun.?” Kira said.

Naruto started the story from start to finish and when he was done all 3 of them were shocked that he was the son of the fourth hokage and he had 2 strong bloodlines. What shocked them the most was when he told them of his status in the bingo book

“wow” they all said in awe.

“shouldn’t you be a jonin then.” Said Kira.

“I could be jonin if I wanted to, but I don’t want any special treatment just because of who my family was.” Naruto said.

“there are two more things I have to tell you.” Naruto the told them the story of when he was 3. where he ran, what he found, he told them about everything that led to him leaving the village for 10 years, including the kyuubi. When he was done with the story they all had tears in their eyes and without warning they all tackled Naruto to the ground and started crying into his chest. He was shocked that they didn’t run or try to kill him so he put his arms around them and whispered soothing words into their ears.

“you went through all that and you’re still yourself?” questioned Saya with tears in her eyes.

“I have an unbreakable will so I can pretty much go through anything.” Naruto said. “I have 1 more thing to tell you guys and it could either make things good or make things very bad.”

Naruto then told them about how the council put the C.R.A on him since he was the last of his clans. When he was done all 3 of them had a blush on their face that could put Hinata to shame.

Saya was the first to speak and she said,” actually Naru-kun I’m bisexual so I wouldn’t mind sharing.” Yukina and Kira just nodded as they were to embarrassed to speak.

It was Naruto’s turn to have a tear in his eye. He found 3 girls who new his secrets and they still wanted to be with him. He then made 2 shadow clones and they all kissed them. One clone was with a tongue battle with Yukina who looked like she was in heaven.

The clone with Saya was also is tongue battle but the clone had a hand on the back of her head while the other hand was on her ass causing her to moan a bit. The real Naruto had yanked Kira’s mask, and she had flawless skin too, and also started a very fierce kiss that was a little rough but it was gentle and full of love and Kira was in Heaven. ‘is this what being in love feels like.’ Was her only thought as she was completely dominated by Naruto.

After they all broke apart for air the only thing they could say was “Wow” and then they fainted from sensual overload. Naruto grinned as the 3 clones carried them back to his house.

When they got back to his house it was near nighttime as the sun just went down and it was now dark outside. When he got there he tucked them all in. when he put Kira to bed he lingered a little longer to look at her face. He noticed that she had perfect skin, a cute childlike nose and a perfect shaped mouth. He ran his fingers over cheek and gave her a small kiss to the cheek. She gave a small smile and Naruto smiled. He turned off the light, and went to his room for some sleep. ‘this was the best day of my life.’ Was the last thought that went through his head before he fell asleep.

Naruto was the first one up. It was 5 o’ clock. He went and did his morning training which was just an all out fight with 2000 clones. He shouted to his clones, “ bring it on”

“charge” the clones shouted back.

He put out a blast of chakra which destroyed about 100 clones. He entered a taijutsu stance he invented called the Elemental fist. When a clone charged he delivered a swift uppercut that destroyed the clone. Then he kicked a clone behind him. Using the momentum he did a front flip, pulled out his sword and infused it with earth chakra. He slammed the blade into the ground and it sent out a shockwave that leveled the earth and caused spikes to rise and skew the clones.

He then put his sword away as he bit his finger and drew the blood over a seal on his arm. Then a black staff with a steel top. He called out:

FIRE STYLE: RAGING FIRE BLAST

A huge blast of fire came out of his staff and it incinerated a lot of clones. He stuck his staff in the ground, did 12 hand seals ending in the snake seal. He called out:

MAGMA STYLE: MAGMA BULET JUTSU

Huge blasts of molten magma came out of his mouth and surrounded all of them. He did the hand seal hare and shouted:

MAGMA STYLE: MAGMA PRISON JUTSU

The magma around them rose up until it made an impenetrable prison. Naruto smirked at his clones and did 20 hand seals ending in horse and said:

STORM STYLE: OMEGA TWISTER JUTSU

A huge twister surrounded them and it destroyed the magma making it fly everywhere, striking a few clones. It picked up trees, bushes and chunks of earth. It also picked up the rest of the clones and the debris killed some of them. The rest (which were about 500.) were able to dodge the debris. Naruto, upon seeing this, smirked and did a few more hand seals and said in a whisper:

STORM STYLE: SLICING TORNADO

The wind in the tornado turned sharp and it cut the rest of the clones to dust.

The tornado disappeared and Naruto heard clapping and turned around to see Kira, Saya, and Yukina clapping. He also noticed that his shirt was ripped a bit. He smirked as he ripped the rest off exposing his well-chiseled chest and his 8-pack abs.

The 3 off them blushed heavily as he disappeared and reappeared behind them in a gust of wind. He wrapped his arms around the 3 of them and whispered seductively to them, “Did you like what you saw,”

They blushed and nodded. Naruto made a few clones and they got behind Kira and Saya, while he stayed on Yukina, and started kissing them on their necks. They gasped and their eyes rolled back as they relaxed in his arms.

The real Naruto was softly sucking on Yukina’s neck, leaving a small hicky. Yukina was in a state of pure bliss as she relaxed in her boyfriend’s arms. Naruto and his clones then stopped and the 3 girls pouted because the pleasure they were feeling was gone.

“sorry we have to stop because our exam is in 10 minutes.” Naruto said sadly, since he was enjoying himself to.

They all got dressed, ate breakfast and sped to training ground 44. they met Anko there sitting patiently until she spotted them and was immediately in front of Kira scarring her a little.

“ Where were you last night young lady? Your father near had a heart attack when you didn’t get home last night. If it wasn’t for the hokage showing up and telling him not worry he would have torn through half of Konoha.” Anko said angrily.

Kira was really scared now since her mother had never gotten this angry at her before, but thankfully Naruto came to the rescue,

“actually Mrs. Hatake, Kira-chan was training with me, Saya-chan, and Yukina-chan. They trained to hard and passed out so I took them to my house where they stayed there the night. We didn’t do anything last night I swear.” Naruto said calmly not wavering in the slightest bit when he saw Anko’s furious glare.

Anko then smiled and said “ did you happen to see under her mask?”

Naruto raised his eyebrow and said, “ yes I did. I saw her face when I gave her some water to get some of her fluids back.”

Anko’s grin got even bigger, “if that is true then you need to come the Hatake clan house later tonight.”

Naruto sweat dropped, “ok I’ll be there later tonight”

Everyone else was confused. “all right it’s now time for your real genin exam. All you have to do is find, capture and get these 3 bells from me.” Anko said as she held up 3 bells.

“but there are only 3 bells and there’s 4 of us.” Saya said.

“I know. It means that only 3 of you will pass. I want all of you to come at me with the intent to kill and begin.” Anko explained and then disappeared into the ground. Before anyone could do anything, Naruto grabbed all 3 of them and disappeared into the forest.

They reappeared on a tree branch. Naruto let go of them and said, “it’s a trick. We have to work together to get the bells.”

They all nodded.

“all right here’s the plan…..” said Naruto as he told them the plan.

Anko was bored. The little brats haven’t attacked yet and there was almost no time left. Then Kira came out of the forest and faced her mother. “so Kira-chan, you want to try and take the bells. Well let’s see what you got.”

Kira then did hand seals and called out:

WIND STYLE:WIND BLADE JUTSU

Anko barely dodged it because she didn’t expect Kira to know that jutsu. “Kira, where did you learn that jutsu?” Anko asked suspiciously.

“hehehehehe that’s because I’m not Kira.” ‘Kira’ said as she poofed and in her place was Naruto.

Naruto did hand seals and shouted:

MAGMA STYLE: MAGMA RIVER JUTSU

The earth cracked all around her and a river of magma appeared around her. She cursed as she tried to jump when a cry of:

FIRE STYLE: DRAGON FLAME JUTSU

She twirled in the air as she narrowly dodged the flames, but it nicked her coat and it caught on fire. She took off the coat and threw it to the ground.

She landed out of the river of magma and found that she couldn’t move.

“SHADOW POCCESION JUTSU success” Yukina said.

Anko couldn’t believe that she was caught by a bunch of kids. She then smirked and said, “:you may have caught me but once your shadow goes on for about 30 seconds I’ll be able to escape since you don’t have a lot of chakra.”

Yukina cursed, she was right she didn’t have enough chakra and Anko could brake free in about 15 seconds. That is if Naruto didn’t come to the rescue, and with that he said:

“not if I have anything to say about it, SEALING JUTSU: TRIANGLE SEAL.”

He created 2 shadow clones and the got into a triangle formation. They started to glow and then they were connected with a weird gray chakra. It made a triangle and Anko got trapped in it.

Anko and everyone else were awed at the site of the 30-foot triangle. Naruto smirked and said, “I would give up if I were you Anko-sensei. I can easily keep you in this until your chakra runs out or I can make the triangle explode and you will be dead.”

Anko sighed , “fine I give up.”

Naruto dropped the jutsu, and Anko gave him the 3 bells. “now who gets the bells?”

Naruto tossed the 3 bells to the girls and said, “we all pass. The test was of teamwork and we all worked together. As soon as the test began we I told them of the true purpose and we made a plan. The plan worked and we got the bells.”

“your right. The test was about teamwork. You all worked together and looked out for each other. I want you all to memorize this phrase ‘ A person who breaks the rules is called trash, but those who abandon their friends and comrades are lower than trash.’”

They all took these words to heart as Anko announced that they would start missions tomorrow and she shunshined away.

Naruto asked if they would like to go for something to eat. They agreed and went to eat, all happy that they were all ninja.
111111.title: Chapter 6

1111111.content:
On a street in town we find one Hinata Hyuga walking down the street uncharacteristic thought going through her head. ‘All right, tonight is the night that I remove this mask of weakness and show my real self.’

She arrived at the Hyuga mansion in only 5 minutes. “ Excuse Me,” she said in an even more emotionless voice then Hiashi himself.

The guards were a little scared since this was not the shy, quiet Hinata they knew. They shakily nodded and they let Hinata in the compound. As she passed the guards looked into her eyes and saw that they were devoid of life. ‘It looks like Hiashi-sama finally broke her. I’m sorry we couldn’t help you Hinata-sama.’ Was the thought that went through the guard’s heads.

Hinata was walking down the hall when she came across her little sister and her cousin Neji walking down the hall. You see, when her father gave up on Hinata’s training when she was 6 her father assigned Neji to guard Hanabi instead of guarding a and I quote ‘Failure to the Hyuga.’ (what a dick)

Hanabi noticed her sister walking their way and she sneered at her. It was no secret that Hanabi disliked her sister. Her father had already drilled into Hanabi that power was everything and if anyone was weaker than you they were trash or commoners. ( again what a dick.)

“Well look who it is Neji. It’s the failure of the Hyuga clan.” Hanabi taunted. Neji said nothing but you could tell that he was agreeing with Hanabi by looking in his eyes.

Hinata said in a cold voice, “Hello Hanabi, and hello to you to Neji. If you would please move so I can go to my meeting with father.” She spat the word father like it was the foulest poison in the world.

Hanabi and even Neji were shocked at her tone. It was colder than ice. The wordlessly stepped aside and Hinata walked through them down the hall.

Hanabi and Neji stood there for a few seconds before they followed Hinata.

In the Hyuga training dojo.

Hiashi and Hyuga elders were all seated in the dojo waiting for Hinata to show up. Hinata showed up and sat down.

“Well Hinata it seems that you have passed your genin exams. For once you have not brought shame to the Hyuga name. To see your skills we will have you spar with Hanabi in an all out match. All the Hyuga will be watching. I will fetch Hanabi and prepare her for the match so don’t be late.”

“yes father” was all Hinata said.

At the Hyuga training grounds

Hinata was sitting on the ground while meditating. Hiashi and Hanabi had just entered and all the Hyuga members they walked by bowed their heads while the branch members scowled at them in their heads. Even some of the less arrogant main members scowled at them.

“this match between my daughter Hanabi and the failure Hinata will now begin.” Hiashi said.

Almost all the members scowled outwardly at that remark. Hinata stayed in her meditated, making no indication that she heard her so-called father. All she did was stand up and open her eyes. Her eyes, that were once full of happiness are no dull, were unique among the clan because she was the only one that had lavender in her eyes. All the other Hyuga had just plain white eyes.

When Hiashi said begin Hanabi charged at Hinata thinking that she could end this battle in one blow. Boy was she wrong. She was about to hit Hinata when she just disappeared .

All she hit was an after image. Then she turned around only to meet a gentle fist, which was far from gentle, to the gut. Hanabi lurched forward and coughed up some blood.

The elders as well as Hiashi were shocked since they didn’t think Hinata possessed that kind of speed and power.

Hanabi was still coughing while Hinata was looking down at her with an unreadable expression on her face. When Hanabi looked up and saw her sister’s eyes she felt even more fear than when her father was glaring at her.

She fell back and landed on her ass. “ H-hinata” she stuttered.

Hinata just raised her hand and charged chakra into it. “it seems you are the weak one now pathetic little sister.” She said in a cold voice.

Hanabi actually had tears in her eyes. Hinata then kicked her in the air and shouted

EIGHT TRIGRAMS: MOUNTAIN CRUSHER

When Hanabi started falling back down she was caught in a blinding flash of white light before she was propelled through the wall.

Everyone was now shocked that Hinata had finished Hanabi in 3 strikes. She stood there with her hand stretched out. A few seconds passed before she turned and walked away.

Hiashi getting out of his shock called for the medics. They came and checked Hanabi. She had a fractured jaw, two broken ribs and her left arm was completely crushed. Hiashi told them to get her to the medical facility.

The elders also didn’t look too happy. “Hiashi, what have you been teaching her?” asked one of the elders.

“I didn’t teach her any of that. I didn’t even know she knew those techniques.” Hiashi said in his defense.

“well someone had to teach it to her since she could never learn those techniques on her own.” Another elder said.

“actually yes she could” said a voice. They turned and saw that the voice belonged to one of the guards that talked to Hinata earlier. His name was Shingo.

“what do you mean?” Hiashi asked.

Shingo decided to tell them the whole story. “ It all started when Hinata was 6. when you stopped training her in the gentle fist arts she had to find some other way to learn. So she came to the branch side to ask for help. We gave her the help that no one else would. The reason she never came to the main side was because years of being around Hiashi-sama made her think that all main branch members were as arrogant and as cruel as you were.”

The main branch members, even the arrogant members, hung their head in shame.

The guard continued, “ after she spent a year of learning with us she could beat all of us individually and the strongest of us combined. She then started looking at clan techniques. She took some of them and learned them in the middle of the night. She was simply amazing when she showed us that she learned all the clan techniques. She is a natural genius if she is taught the right way. She managed to but up with you abusing her for almost all her life. She put up a mask of shyness to make herself look weak. She is, without a doubt, the strongest Hyuga alive.”

Everyone there could hardly believe what they had heard. Hinata, shy little Hinata, was the strongest Hyuga alive. Hiashi was feeling a lot of guilt swelling inside of him. All the branch and even all the main branch members were looking at Hiashi with unmasked anger. The elders didn’t seem to care. (fucking old farts)

“that’s not all. After that incident when she was 9 years old. She was broken. She no longer smiled.” The guard had tears in his eyes now. “ she no longer had life in her eyes any longer. Those eyes were blank and emotionless. I wish that she could smile again. We have tried everything, but nothing works. We fear that because of that incident she will never smile again.” Finished the guard, not bothering to stop the tears that were falling out of his eyes.

All members were openly crying, even the emotionless Neji who hadn’t cried since his father died and Hiashi who hadn’t shed a tear since his wife died. The elders were wondering something.

“ Hiashi, what was this incident.” Asked an elder.

All members were paying attention now. Hiashi started to tell them,

“ It all started when she lost a spar to Hanabi…

flashback jutsu

Hinata was on the floor with bruises and cuts all over her body. She had just finished sparring against her 4-year-old sister Hanabi. She had lost because she didn’t want to hurt her sister. Her father had called her into his office to talk with her. The worst thing was is that all the injuries she had were not from the spar.

“How could you lose to a child who is 5 years younger than you.” Hiashi shouted as he slapped her across the face.

“I-I t-tri-ed m-my b-b-be-est.” she stuttered out as she cried from the pain she was in.

Hiashi ignored her as he screamed, “You have brought shame to our name and now it is time for your punishment.” He pulled a whip out from under his desk.

Hinata was truly frightened and tried to run but Hiashi was quicker as he made 2 clones. The held her down and ripped of her shirt exposing her back. If anybody walked by that room they might here the sounds of a child being tortured, sounds of whips cracking, and whimpers telling the owner to please stop which only increased the screaming,.

Flashback jutsu release.

When Hiashi finished everyone was glaring at him. 1 or 2 elders were also glaring at him.

One of the elders who was glaring said, “I suggest that you try to make up for the harsh treatment you caused her.”

“Unless he goes through the same pain I went through, I can never forgive the man I once called my father.” Said a familiar voice.

They all looked up to see Hinata standing on the roof. She was in different clothes though. She was now in black biker shorts that hugged her hips perfectly. She was also wearing a long-sleeved black shirt with a red vest over it that had the Hyuga symbol on the back. She was also wearing black shinobi sandals and apparently she had a genjutsu on her hair because it now went down to her shoulder blades.

Hinata looked right at Hiashi and said, “Until you have felt the pain I have felt I can never forgive you.” Then she disappeared in flurry of leaves.

The Hyuga all got over their shock and went back inside, but not before giving one last glare to Hiashi.

Hiashi sank to his knees and cried while he thought this to himself. ‘I am so sorry Hinata. I will find a way to make this up to you somehow. I swear it on your mother’s grave.’

In Sarutobi’s office he was currently reading a little orange book while giggling perversely, while his clones did his work, wait clones. He learned to beat paperwork in the scroll he read to the council. He felt rather stupid when he read it.

Flashback jutsu
Sarutobi was in his office facing a kage’s worst enemy. PAPERWORK. He was getting frustrated because no matter how much he did it kept growing. He suddenly remembered the scroll that Naruto had sent him. He opened the scroll to the bottom, saw the seal and opened it. What he read was something that nearly made him have heart attack.

‘If you want to beat paperwork. Just try shadow clones.’

It had a picture of a chibi Naruto holding his hand in the peace sign.

Sarutobi did something that no one ever saw him do. He started hitting his head on the desk saying, “stupid stupid stupid” over and over again. He made some clones and had them do the paperwork while he pulled out a little orange book and started to read while giggling.

Flashback jutsu release

Sarutobi looked at the clock and saw that was time for him to go get the results from the jonin. He shunshined to the meeting room, waiting for the jonin.

After 5 minutes the room was packed with jonin. They were only missing Kakashi who showed up another 5 minutes later. The hokage threatened to ban him from the bookstore if he didn’t show up in time.

“All right let’s hear which teams passed and which teams failed.” Sarutobi announced

“Team 1, failed”

“Team 2, failed”

“Team 3, failed”

“Team 4 failed”

“Team 5 failed”

“Team 6 failed miserably”

“Team 7 passed barely”

That got everyone’s attention since Kakashi never passes a team. Before questions can be asked the hokage said that they will finish first and then ask questions.

“Team 8 passed.”

“Team 9 passed with flying colors”

“Team 10 passed”

“For all the teams that passed I would like you to explain how they passed.” Sarutobi said.

Kurenai went first, “My team consists of Hinata Hyuga, Kiba Inuzuka, And Shino Aburame. As far as I can tell is that with a little work they can become a perfect tracking squad. Hinata, from what I read, was supposed to be shy and quiet, but she was very perceptive, and figured out the true meaning of the test immediately and got the other two to work with her. She has complete mastery over her byakugan and seems to have invented techniques of her own. If I had to guess she held back during the test and could be at least jonin level right now.”

Everyone had to pick to pick their jaws of the floor as they heard her description of Hinata. Kurenia continued:

“Kiba is a loud, brash, and very arrogant boy. I’ll have to work on that in the future. Shino is just like your typical Aburame; he is quiet, coolheaded and only talks when he needs to.”

Asuma went next, “ my team is just like the normal Ino-Shika-Cho trio. Ino is a typical fangirl, but she is making improvement. Shikamaru is like any other Nara. A lazy, non-motivated, cloud-watching boy. The same with Choji, he’s your typical Akimichi. They have the potential to become a capture/interrogation squad.”

Kakashi went next, “my team is made up of Sasuke Uchiha. Sakura Haruno, and Sai. They barely passed though. Sakura is the worst-case scenario of a fangirl. When Sasuke is anywhere near her. If me and Sai were dangling off a cliff and out of chakra, about to die and Sasuke had a scratch on him she would let us die. Sasuke has potential, but he is way to arrogant. He feels that if anyone has powerful techniques he doesn’t know, being an Uchiha gives him the right to those techniques. Sai is different though. He used to be a part of roots but since Danzo was killed he has tried to make friends with his teammates but they flat out ignored him. He made friends with me and if it was up to me I would have failed them and made Sai my apprentice, but the council forced me to pass him. If Sasuke and Sakura would learn to work with Sai they could become an assassination squad. With Sasuke’s speed, Sakura’s genjutsu and Sai for support.”

“why is the council forcing you to pass the Uchiha.” Kurenai asked.

“they said if I didn’t they would demote me to chunin and soil my father’s grave further than they already have.” Kakashi said sadly. Anko gave him a hug as he leaned on her shoulder.

The hokage was pissed, “I will have a talk with them after this meeting is done.” Sarutobi said angrily. He motioned for Anko to go.

“My team is probably the most advanced one. It consists of Kira Hatake, Saya Uchiha, Yukina Nara, and Naruto Namikaze. My team is quite unique. Naruto figured out the test as soon as it began. He grabbed the other 3 and teleported to a safer location. They came up with a brilliant plan. First Naruto transformed to look like Kira and attacked me with a high-level wind jutsu. He then did some kind of magma jutsu and and I was surrounded by molten magma. I tried to get out of there but Saya nicked me with a b-ranked fire jutsu. I got away but when I landed Yukina trapped me in her shadow jutsu and to make sure I couldn’t make sure I couldn’t escape Naruto caught me in a sealing jutsu that slowly drained my chakra. He told me to give up or he would make the prison blow up. If I had to guess that Yukina is low-chunin rank. Saya is high-chunin rank. Me and Kakashi-kun trained Kira so we know that she is at least high-chunin. Naruto, fro what I could tell is sannin or maybe even kage level. He was holding back a lot during the exam and I could tell that if ha wanted to beat me, he could have done it in one move.” Anko finished.

Everyone shuddered at the thought of Naruto going out. All the jonin in the room don’t think any ill feelings towards him. They all considered him a comrade to the leaf..

Sarutobi cleared his throat, getting everyone’s attention. “Thank you for this information. Team missions will begin tomorrow. Now if you will excuse me I have a council to raise hell upon.” Sarutobi said with an evil laugh.

Everyone else sweat dropped. Anko then remembered something. “Oh yeah, Kakashi-kun we will be having company tonight.”

Kakashi raised an eyebrow, “Really now. Who will be coming?”

Anko smiled and replied, “ you’ll see later tonight. Now let’s go home and freshen up.”

Kakashi nodded and they left. Pretty soon everyone else left to go do there own things. Asuma and Kurenai went home to do things..uh… lovers do.(fuck like rabbits in heat.) Kakashi and Anko went home to get things ready for their dinner guest. Lastly Sarutobi went to raise hell on those unsuspecting old farts and pig fuckers of the council.

With Naruto

Naruto and Kira had just dropped Yukina and Saya off back at their homes. Naruto was gonna ask Saya why she lived in that run down apartment tomorrow. Right now Naruto and Kira were making their way to the Hatake clan compound.

“Are you nervous about meeting me father Naru-kun?” Kira asked.

“ Not really, since I’ve met tons of crazy people. I don’t think your dad can be too crazy. It’s your mom that scares me.” Naruto responded.

“Don’t worry Naru-kun, mom can be a big softy once you get to know her.” Kira said, as they got closer to the house. Naruto got a grin on his face that scarred Kira a bit.

“She’s a softy eh? Do you think you’re any tougher?” Naruto said with the grin still on his face. Kira slowly nodded. “ Well then little miss toughie, are you tough enough to survive against this?” he questioned as he began to….tickle her.

“hehehehe ….. ahhhhh hahahahahaha okay, ahaa, I haha give hahahahahahahaha up …ahhhhhhhh hahaha.” Kira said between laughs.

Naruto stopped his torture and once Kira regained her breath. She glared at Naruto but he just laughed. She then pouted. “ That was mean Naru-kun.” Though she secretly enjoyed it.

“Yeah, here let me make it up to you.” Naruto said as he pulled her mask down a bit to give her a small kiss on the mouth. Kira sighed into the kiss, but was disappointed when it ended.

“Come on, we have to get to your house.” Naruto said. Kira nodded

when the got to the Hatake clan house, Naruto took note of its size. It was smaller than most clan compounds. It looks to be the size of a normal oversized house. It was the color gray and it had about 2-3 sections to it.

They saw Anko out there to greet them. “Anko-sensei” Naruto called.

Anko looked towards the source of the voice and saw that it was Naruto. “Hey Naruto, Kira-chan.”

“Hi mom” Kira called.

Anko led them inside the compound and it looked like the inside of a normal house. He looked around until his eyes landed on a man with gravity defying gray hair. He was wearing an ash gray tee shirt, along with a pair of blue jeans. He was wearing normal civilian shoes and he had a mask covering the lower half of his face just like Kira.

“Hello Naruto, Kira.” Stated the man

“how do you know Naru0kun, father.” Kira questioned.

‘Naru-kun’ the man thought, “Remember Kira, I told you stories about him when you were little.” Kira blushed embarrassed while Naruto laughed.

“Kakashi Hatake” he said sticking his hand out.

Naruto took his hand saying, “Naruto Namikaze at your service.”

“It is nice to officially meet you Naruto. I think dinner is almost ready. So let’s go eat.” Kakashi said.

They had a nice dinner. They had some teriyaki chicken with some white rice. The dinner was also filled with some tempura and eggplant. The dinner was filled with some idle chitchat, a few laughs here and there, the normal stuff.

When they werwe done they retired to the living room. Anko started to talk, “The reason I called you here was to discuss something with you.”

Naruto raised an eyebrow, “What would you like to talk about.” Naruto said calmly.

“Have you seen under Kira’s mask?” Anko asked seriously.

When she asked this question several things happened at once,

Kakashi choked on his own spit.

Naruto sweat dropped.

Kira looked confused.

Kakashi looked at Anko, “You don’t mean that he actually…” Anko nodded

Naruto decided to answer the question, “Yes, I have seen behind her mask before. Was that a bad thing?”

Anko shook her head to his question and asked Kira, “Did you let him look under your mask or did he force it off?”

Kira still looked confused as she answered, “He didn’t force it off of me. I let him take it off.” Anko nodded and then smiled.

“Would you mind telling me what this is all about.” Naruto said

“When a woman of the Hatake clan lets a male see under her mask by law they are now married.” Kakashi answered.

Naruto and Kira were shocked, but that shock soon turned to joy as Kira gave Naruto a big hug. Naruto snapping out of his shock, smiled and hugged her back.

When they broke apart Naruto noticed that both Kakashi and Anko were looking at them happily. Naruto then turned serious, “You realize that she is now a member of the Namikaze clan”

They both nodded and said, “Yes we do, but we would rather see her with someone we know then someone who will just hit her and quit her later. Even though you two haven’t known each other for long we can tell by looking in your eyes that you love each other.”

Kira and Naruto just looked at each other and said, “ I love you Kira Hatake. Even though we have only known each other for a month I can honestly say it was love at first sight. Will you marry me?” Naruto asked getting on one knee.

Kira had tears in her eyes as she replied, “Yes Naruto Namikaze, I will marry you.”

Naruto got up, pulled her mask down and gave her a passionate kiss that made sparkd fly between them.

Kakashi and Anko looked on with tears in their eyes. Their little girl was all grown up and she was engaged to a good man. They knew Naruto would protect her with his life.
1111111.title: Chapter 7

11111111.content:
Sarutobi was currently damning the council to hell in his head. He just had the emergency meeting and he was not happy.

Flashback jutsu
Sarutobi had just called the council into a meeting. When they were all got in there they could tell he was not happy.

‘Oh no, did he find out?’ was the thought that went through most of the civilians heads.

“The reason I have called you hear is to tell you something I have discovered recently.” Sarutobi said calmly... a little to calmly.

“Just tell us what you are planning on telling us Sarutobi.” Koharu stated rudely.

Sarutobi looked at her with a straight face, “You will watch how you speak to me Koharu. I am the hokage and I can easily disband this council for a bunch of reasons. So watch your tongue or I may just remove it.” He said in a cold voice.

Koharu gulped as everyone backed away from Sarutobi. They had never seen him this angry since he saw the second hokage fall in battle back in the second great shinobi war.

“As I was saying. It has come to my attention that you,” he said pointing at the civilian half, “have been threatening one of my ninja to pass one Sasuke Uchiha. How do you all plead?”

“We plead guilty.” Said the Haruno head like it was no big deal.

“You do realize I can put you all in jail for threatening a fellow shinobi of the leaf.” Sarutobi said seriously.

The civilian half looked a little scared, but the Haruno head again answered in bored voice, “We had to pass him to make sure the sharingan stays in our village.”

“If Sasuke is so important then why not force Anko to pass Saya too?” Sarutobi asked.
