This time Homura answered, “When Saya was born. She was born different then most Uchiha. When she turned six she was as powerful as an Uchiha with two sharingan tomoe. But she was born differently, she was born with a tumor in her eyes. It prevented her from ever unlocking the sharingan. The also will never be able to pass it on. So she was basically worthless to the Uchiha clan, and disowned at 7 when they found out.”

Sarutobi was surprised that the Uchiha would do that just to make themselves look more powerful and not show any weakness.

“Regardless, you still did not have the authority to pass the Uchiha. That authority is strictly in the power of the jonin sensei.”

“That may be true, but it’s too late now since he has already been passed.” Said the Haruno head smugly.

“True, but he no longer a citizen of the leaf, but a Shinobi and therefore under my command.” Sarutobi stated smugly.

The civilians frowned at this. It was true. When someone became a ninja they were under the control of the ninja council instead of the civilian side.

“Now then since you have forced Sasuke to graduate when he wasn’t supposed to he will have to do triple the amount of d-rank mission before he does a c-rank mission, and only the sensei can recommend him for the chunin exams.” Sarutobi stated.

The civilians stood up and one shouted in outrage, “That is not fair hokage-sama.”

This time Sarutobi stood up and yelled. “I am the hokage and I make the punishments. You civilians have stepped out of line ever since the first hokage ruled. Mark my words, the next time any of you step out of line I will have you all executed for insubordination. This meeting is over” he then shunshined out of the room leaving everybody speechless.

He then came back in and said, “I forgot my pipe.” He picked the pipe up and shunshined again.

Everyone sweat dropped.

Flashback jutsu release

“Naruto, hurry up and turn 21 so I can retire.” Sarutobi said out loud.

He made some clones, had them do the work while he read his book.

With Naruto

Naruto sneezed. “Is something wrong Naru-kun.” Kira asked.

“No, someone must be talking about me. I am famous you know.” Naruto said striking a pose. Kira laughed at his actions.

They walked down the streets a bit until Naruto said, “Kira, I know that we are now engaged, but I think we should try and get to know each other better. I don’t want to move things on to fast.”

Kira nodded signifying that she agreed. “I agree, I think we should go on a couple dates to get to know each other more. You should probably do the same with Saya and Yukina.” Naruto nodded.

“well we already had dinner at your place so I think we can go train for a bit. I could teach you some new jutsu.” Naruto said.

Kira, at the mention of new jutsu, started jumping around like a little kid on Christmas morning. “ Oh thank you Naru-kun, thank you. “ she said giving him a big hug.

“your welcome Kira-chan.” Naruto responded as he returned the hug.

They decided to go to training ground 17. when they got there Naruto pulled out a plain white card. “Kira-chan, this is known as an elemental card. When you pump chakra into it, different things can happen.”

“what kind of things?” Kira asked.

“if it catches on fire it shows that your elemental affinity is fire, it gets wet for water, crumbles for lightning, turns to dust for earth and splits in half for wind.” Naruto explained.

Kira nodded as Naruto handed her the card. She pumped chakra into it and the card split in two pieces, one half of it burned and the other half crumpled.

Naruto whistled, “Wow Kira-chan. You have 2 affinities. You have one for lightning and one for fire. Normally you have to be at least low jonin level to get even one affinity. But two, you must be pretty strong.”

Kira blushed at his praise. “thank you Naru-kun.”

“your welcome” he replied. “ For now I am going to teach you a fire jutsu so stand back.” She stood back as Naruto went through some hand seals before calling out:

FIRE STYLE: PHEONIX FLAMETHROWER JUTSU

A widely spread stream of blue fire came out of his mouth. It warped into a phoenix head and it sprayed fire out of its mouth on to the ground below. Then it dived down and exploded on impact with the ground.

Naruto turned around to see Kira’s wide eyed expression. He nearly laughed at it. He walked over to her and he closed her mouth. She got out of her stupor and practically yelled out. “that was the most amazing thing I’ve ever seen.”

This time Naruto did chuckle. “yes that is one amazing jutsu. That is an s-rank fire jutsu of my own invention. Since you are now a member of the Namikaze clan you will have access to our techniques.”

Kira nodded.

“that technique I showed you is a very complicated. It what probably be in the forbidden scroll since it takes up chakra equal to that of a low jonin. But thanks to me fusing with kyuubi, my chakra reserves barely gave 1 of my chakra.”

Kira was surprised that Naruto had so much chakra. She decided to start practicing the jutsu. She did the hand seals, called out the name and a normal sized phoenix came out. The only problem was that this phoenix was nowhere near the size of Naruto’s and the fire wasn’t blue, but red.

Kira felt sad that she couldn’t do it. Naruto, upon noticing, tried to cheer her up, “it’s okay Kira-chan, that is an s-rank jutsu for a reason. If you keep practicing, you’ll get it in no time.” Kira brightened up at this. She went right back to work.

4 HOURS LATER

Kira was on the ground panting. She had managed to get most of the jutsu done. The only things that were wrong was that her phoenix was only half the size of Naruto’s and the fire wasn’t blue.

“that was good.” She heard him say. “you almost got the whole technique down. The only problem now is that we have to work on is building your chakra reserves. Do you know the tree walking exercise?” she nodded.

“what about the water walking?” Naruto asked. Kira shook her head.

“then tomorrow we are going to work on the water walking. We are also going to get Saya and Yukina her to work on these exercises.” She nodded. “Let’s get you home now.”

“I’m too tired to get up. Will you carry me home, please?” Kira asked with the puppy eye jutsu. SSSS-rank ninja or not, Naruto could never resist the puppy eye jutsu. He caved

“all right Kira. I’ll carry you home.” Naruto responded. He picked her up bridal style, eliciting a squeak from her, and started to carry her back to the house.

When he got back to the house he noticed that Kira had fallen asleep in his arms. He opened the door and saw Kakashi and Anko sitting on the couch watching T.V.

“Hey could you tell me where Kira’s room is?” Naruto asked.

They were about to answer when they saw Kira in Naruto’s arms. They immediately rushed over to him and started to hound him with questions. Naruto soon got irritated and shouted, “Be quiet.” They shut up almost instantly. Amazingly Kira stayed asleep through all the shouting.

“We were just training and she got tired and asked if I would carry her home. I agreed and she fell asleep in my arms.” Naruto explained.

They relaxed a bit and apologized for shouting. Naruto waved them of saying it was okay. Kakashi asked a question that was on his mind, “What exactly were teaching her Naruto?”

“I was teaching her about elemental affinities.” Naruto responded.

Anko and Kakashi were shocked, “Isn’t she a little to young to learn about that stuff?” Anko asked.

Naruto set Kira down on the couch as he responded, “apparently she isn’t because she has an affinity to fire and lightning.”

They were both so shocked that they thought they were going to faint.

“I was teaching her a fire technique that I created called the phoenix flamethrower. It’s an S-rank jutsu. She almost mastered it all she really needs to do is build up her chakra reserves.”

This time Anko fainted. Kakashi was barely holding onto consciousness. Naruto was done talking and went home but not before shouting a goodnight to Kakashi and giving a small kiss on the cheek to Kira. Kakashi picked Kira up and put her in her own bed and said a goodnight to her. He then went back down stairs, got Anko and he put her in bed. Then he got in bed himself.

When Naruto got home he was tired so he went to bed after changing into his night time clothes. He then had wonderful dreams about Kira, Saya and Yukina. Not perverted dreams, but dreams of the future where all 3 of them were happy and having their kids play together.

In the morning

We now find Naruto, Saya, Yukina, and Kira working on building their chakra reserves. It turns out that all of them knew the tree walking exercise and Saya knew the water walking exercise. Right now Kira and Yukina were working on water walking while Naruto was working with Saya on kunai balancing. They were currently waiting for Anko to show up.

It was 15 minutes later that Anko had finally shown up. In that time Kira and Yukina had learned the water walking and Saya had almost gotten the kunai balancing.

“So what have you all been doing here?” Anko asked.

They told her that Naruto was helping them with chakra control exercises. To which Anko responded,

“Thanks Naruto, that makes one less thing I have to teach you little squirts.” They all sweat dropped.

“Well let’s go get a mission okay.” Said Anko. They nodded and followed her to the hokage’s office where they would soon discover the horror of D-rank missions.

1 MONTH LATER

after a long month of D-rank mission’s team 9 could only say one thing about them.

THEY SUCK MORE ASS THAN SASUKE

They had cleaned gutters, babysitted babies, pulled weeds and the worst of them all. They chased the daimyo wife’s cat 5 TIMES.

They were now in the hokage’s office getting a new mission. Then Naruto said to the hokage, “Hokage-sama, I think we have done enough D-rank to qualify for at least 4 C-rank missions”

Sarutobi was a little scared since Naruto only called him by that title when he was serious or when he was pissed. There was nothing serious so he must be pissed.

Iruka, who was helping with missions today, said to Naruto, “You might be ready for higher missions, but are your teammates ready for a higher mission.”

Anko stepped up and said, “I think my team is more than ready for a C-rank mission. Hell my team could probably take on several B-rank missions.”

“Well if you really think your team is ready for missions like that then here.” Sarutobi said tossing them s scroll that was labeled C-rank. “Please bring in the client.”

A middle aged man wearing a sleeveless brown shirt, tan pants, and a rain hat, drinking a bottle of sake came in.

“these are the brats that are supposed to protect me. The only one that looks strong is the blonde and the blonde one. All the others look weak.” The man said a little drunk.

Naruto quickly made 4 clones to hold them all back. While they were trying to escape the real Naruto walked right up to Tazuna and told him in a calm voice. “I assure you that we are all capable ninja. Our sensei is an elite jonin. The rest of us can take care of ourselves.”

“If your sure, but I would feel more comfortable if there was one more team.” Tazuna said nervously.

Only Sarutobi, Naruto and Anko caught his nervousness, but decided to ignore it. “If your sure then I suppose we could make this a joint mission.” Sarutobi said.

Just then team 7 and 8 walked through the door. Sasuke upon seeing Naruto, was not very happy. “hmph, if it isn’t the idiot of the century. What are you doing in here anyway you moron?” Sasuke said rudely.

“If you must know Sasgay, we were receiving a C-rank mission from the hokage.” Naruto said in a monotone.

This time it was Kiba who responded, “What. Why would they give a higher mission to a blonde haired idiot like you?”

Both Kurenia and Kakashi bonked them over their heads and told them to watch their mouths.

“actually I was just about to call in team 8, you will be going on joint c-rank mission-“ the hokage was interrupted by the shrill voice of the pink-haired banshee.

“but hokage-sama why are they going instead of us. They aren’t as strong as my Sasuke-kun.”

The other genins looked pissed at her for saying they were weaker then somebody else when she was the weakest one out of all the people here. In fact Sai decided to voice his opinion of that comment,

“Your one to talk since you’re the weakest one of us here, you pink-haired whore.”

Kakashi decided to intervene before someone got sent to the hospital. “That is enough you two. Sai you need to not always insult your teammates.” Sai just nodded. Sakura looked smug. That soon ended when Kakashi added, “And you need to learn to keep your big mouth shut and not interrupt the Hokage. Sai is right though, of all the genins you’re the weakest and it will stay that way unless you stop stalking Sasuke and start training. Oh and FYI Sasuke is no the strongest there are a lot of genins that stronger then him so stop fawning over him all the time because it is very creepy.” Kakashi said all this not once talking his face away from the book he was reading.

Sakura looked ready to cry, Sasuke was livid at not being the strongest genin in the village. (A/N: for your information duckass, just because you’re an Uchiha doesn’t entitle you to being the strongest. All it entitles you to is the right to suck dick like the flaming fag you are. (sorry if your gay, I have nothing against gay people)). Sai had a smile on his face.

Kiba was laughing his ass off. Shino didn’t even look like he heard anything. Hinata had a slight smirk on her face since she found the whole thing a little amusing. Kurenai was shaking her head at how weak Sakura was.

The girls of team 9 were all giggling to themselves while Naruto said, “Buuuuuurn.”

The hokage cleared his throat, “As I was saying, I will be sending team 9 and team 8 on a joint C-rank mission to Wave Country. You will be protecting Mr. Tazuna while he finishes building a bridge in his country. You are just to protect him from natural thieves and bandits. Meet at the East gate in 2 hours.”

The teams nodded and left. Now only team 7 was left. “Will we be taking a mission Hokage-sama?” Sai asked.

“Hmm, oh yes. Team 7 your mission is to catch the cat Tora. Hurry along now before he gets away.” Sarutobi said while ushered them out of the room. They wordlessly left the room while. Sasuke still had a pissed off look on his face. Sakura still looked like she was going to cry. Sai still had a smile on his face, and Kakashi still had his nose buried in his book.

2 HOURS LATER AT THE EAST GATE

all the teams were there at the gate waiting for their sensei and the client. The decided to catch up with the other teams.

Naruto went to talk to Hinata. “Hello Hinata.” Naruto said

Hinata saw him, and nodded to him. Naruto noticed that she was acting a lot differently then she did back in the academy. “Your acting a lot differently then you did back in the academy. In the academy I thought you were the shy, cute type, but I can see that you are the badass, hot type. So, what caused you to change?”

If Hinata had been her other self she would have blushed cherry red and fainted, but since she was the new Hinata she only had a tinge of pink on her face as she answered, “The shinobi are masters of deception, so I made myself a mask that showed myself to be weak and shy so people would underestimate me.”

“I see, but why did you do it?” asked Naruto.

Hinata then told Naruto about everything. From when her father gave up on her training, to her befriending the branch family, to her mastering all the techniques. She told him about everything, she didn’t know why, but she felt she could trust this guy. She even told him of the torture she got when she was 9.

When Naruto heard the story he felt anger, happiness and sadness. Anger at Hiashi and almost all the Hyuga. Happiness that Hinata had mastered very complicated techniques. Sadness because shi must have an almost as bad childhood as he had. He ushered Hinata to come to him. She hesitated before she did. When she was close enough Naruto wrapped his arms around her waist and teleported somewhere else. No one noticed that they even left.

SOMEWHERE IN THE FORREST

When they landed in the forrest Naruto let go of Hinata who ready to kill him.

“What’s the big idea blondie.” Hinata screamed at him.

Naruto ignored the comment and said in a nice voice, “I’m going to heal those scars on your back.”

That caused Hinata to stiffen for a minute before she looked up at him. “Can you really do that?” she asked with a tint of hope in her voice.

“Yes I can, but your going to have to trust me.” Naruto said in a serious, but kind, voice.

“okay” she said quietly.

Naruto told her to take off her shirt and lie on her stomach. She was a little hesitant doing this in front of a guy, but did it non-the-less. (he turned around when she did it for all you perverts out there.)

When she lied down Naruto noticed that her entire back was covered in bandages. He slowly removed the bandages and saw the nastiest whip marks he had ever seen. (and that is really saying something.)

He was disgusted that her own father did this to her. ‘and they call me demon’ Naruto thought sarcastically.

He charged his hands with medical chakra except that it was red instead of green. (side-effect from absorbing Kyuubi.)

He touched the bottom of her back softly and ran his hands up her back and slowly the wounds began to heal. When he was done the scars and wounds were all gone. Her back was smooth as the day she was born.

“it’s okay I’m done now and you have no more wounds on your back.” Naruto said soothingly.

Hinata, for the first time since her mother died when she was 5 felt happy. Once she had everything back on she gave Naruto a little peck on the cheek and thanked him for healing her. She smiled truly for the first time in over 8 years.

When they got back it looked like no one even noticed they were gone. 5 minutes later both Kurenai and Anko showed up.

“YOU’RE LATE” shouted everyone but Naruto, Shino, and Hinata.

“We had to find the client. He was in a bar almost passed out.” said Anko not showing the slightest bit that she heard them.

They started walking along the path and then they saw a puddle. They all new that it was a disguise but Kiba had to comment, “that has got to be the lamest disguise in the world.”

Everyone sighed at Kiba’s stupidity as the two ninja in there sped towards them. Naruto reacted and drew his sword. He charged it with lightning chakra and stuck it in the chain. The lightning went up the chain and electrocuted them. They detached their chains before it could do major damage. They made a dash for the client before they nicked Kiba with their claws. Then Yukina caught them in her shadow technique. They couldn’t move, then Naruto shouted out to Hinata “Incapacitate them.”

She did and they were out like lights. Naruto ran over to Kiba and checked his wound, “Their claws have some poison on them. We need to let the poison bleed out.” Naruto said seriously. He cut Kiba’s hand and let the poison bleed out. He wrapped his hand after words.

“Tazuna we need to have a talk.” Kurenai said.

(skip Tazuna’s talk)

“This is serious. This is beyond our skill. The only ninja here who are even close to being ready for this kind of danger are Kurenai/Anko sensei, me and Hinata. We should probably go back.” Naruto said. “but what kind of ninja would we be if we abandoned a client.”

Anko nodded “Naruto is right normally we would go back and get some reinforcements, but we got all the man power we need.” Anko turned to look at Kurenai “You may stay with us if you please, but it would be better if you leave and go back to the village.

Kurenai smirked and said to Anko, “And miss all the fun, you got to be kidding. Besides my students need some action to make it in the shinobi world.”

Anko nodded, “All right it looks like we will be going on with the mission old man”

“Thank you so much.” Tazuna said happily with tears in his eyes.

“Well let’s go.” Said Kiba.

Everyone wordlessly went on the path. They were now more alert. The demon brothers were left tied up for anbu.

Someone in the tree said to himself, “Well looks like I’ll get to fight the Sojokou Senkou sooner than I thought. Be prepared because my sword will claim your life.” He then disappeared.
